titleStmt.title: Sacred eloquence: or, the art of rhetorick, as it is layd down in Scripture. By the right Reverend Father John Prideaux late Lord Bishop of VVorcester.
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, John, 1578-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for George Sawbridge, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible on Ludgate-Hill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
